title: The Red Badge of Courage (Part 8)
description: A fleeing Union soldier strikes Henry in the head with his rifle, leaving a bloody wound. A "cheery" soldier guides the wounded Henry back to his regiment at nightfall.
meta: Use the Reading strategy of retelling to better understand a text
